definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
variant of 繞|绕[rao4], to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour
to wind/to coil (thread)/to rotate around/to spiral/to move around/to go round (an obstacle)/to by-pass/to make a detour/to confuse/to perplex

sentences.english: His long, improvised dirges will ring forever in my ears.
sentences.chinese: 他长篇与即兴的哀歌将永远回绕于我的耳际。

sentences.english: Because of the complex topography, the road has to twists through the mountain.
sentences.chinese: 由于地势复杂，道路只能回绕在山间。

sentences.english: The sound in my mind never faded away.
sentences.chinese: 你的声音在我心中久久回绕。

sentences.english: A warning is printed to the user if a buffer wrap condition has occurred.
sentences.chinese: 如果发生了缓冲区回绕，就向用户输出警告。

definition: to spiral/to circle/to go around/to hover/to orbit
variant of 迴響|回响[hui2 xiang3]
to spin rapidly/to whirl around/(of time) to fly by
to drift/to wave/to float on the waves/to flutter in the wind
